body.name: Executive Leather Office Chair, Big and Tall Office Chair with Footrest Home Office Desk Chairs, Ergonomic Computer Desk Chair with Lumbar Support, Reclining Office Chair with Adjustable Angle
body.stockDetail: Only 9 left in stock - order soon.
features: Comfort Adjustable Headrest: Executive office chair comes with a height-adjustable headrest, which provides extra neck support and customizable height to ensure exceptional comfort tailored to your needs. Whether you are fully focused on your task or just relaxing for a moment, this executive chair provides you with a personalized work experience.

Upgraded Comfort: Big and tall office chair with retractable padded footrest is located underneath the seat, you can pull it out to relax your legs for a short break, preventing the discomfort of swollen feet caused by long hours of sitting, giving you the ultimate use experience. Meanwhile, our seat cushion is made of upgraded sponge and 20 independent springs to help you realize a long time sitting without getting tired, work efficiently, designed for sedentary work.

Ergonomic Design for All-Day Comfort: Ergonomically curved backrest hugs and supports your upper and lower back. Designed for extended use, it keeps you relaxed and invigorated. Effortlessly adjust your posture for optimal productivity throughout the day, enjoying a comfortable office experience tailored to your executive needs.

Waterfall-Shaped Cushioned Armrests: Immerse yourself in the office experience with our armrests, featuring a graceful waterfall-shaped cushion design. Not only do they provide a plush resting spot for your arms, but they also shield your elbows from hard surfaces. Enjoy lasting comfort and maintain a poised posture throughout your workday in this executive office chair.

Multifunctional and Easy to Install: To meet your daily needs, the backrest of this high back office chair can be adjusted and locked in the range of 90-135°. All parts, hardware, tools and instructions included in the package. We also provide installation videos, you can easily complete the assembly in 20-25 minutes. If you have any questions or issues, please feel free to contact our customer support team.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Worth the money!
reviews.reviewText: Nice office chair! Comfortable, reasonable size, multiple functions! I bought it because I want to take a nap after noon. It's what I expected and even more! Soft, warm and easy to assemble!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Very Nice Chair
reviews.reviewText: Overall, this is a very nice chair. It appears to be very well made with quality materials. It comes in a box and requires some assembly. The instructions are fairly clear although there were a couple of steps that I had to read over a couple of times and consult a photo of the finished chair. But in the end, I found it not very difficult to assemble. It only took me a little over 40 minutes from box opening to completely assembled.What I like about the chair: I like the material and the leg rest extension. I have many conference calls every week and I like to put my feet up when talking and this is a great feature to help me with that. I also love how easy it is to access the rest and to put it back. It also has an adjustable head rest which allows me to move it upwards to the most comfortable position for relaxing. I haven't tried yet but I believe I could easily fall asleep in the chair. The base of the chair feels very sturdy. And it seems to roll easily enough.What I don't like: my last office chair had a backrest that was adjustable so that I could either lock it into place or relax it so that it was flexible where you could lean back and the spring tensions would offer some resistance. This char is not adjustable in the amount of tension. It will either lock into place (an adjustable setting for the length that you desire to lay back) or it is unlocked but the tension is almost non-existent. So when you lean back you have to do it slowly or you feel like you will fall backwards. So "rocking" is out of the question.OVerall I really like the chair. I would love it if I could rock but other than that it is really nice!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Super comfortable office chair
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased this office chair, and it has really changed my work experience. This design provides exceptional comfort while I’m working at my desk. The adjustable seat level and padded armrest ensure proper posture that way it can reduce any strain on my back and shoulder as I am getting older. The quality is outstanding as it features smooth responsive mechanisms for height and tilt adjustment. The backrest is comfy for my shoulder. In addition, the seat cushion is both supportive and plush; thus, allowing me to be supported throughout my usage. One standout feature is the versatility of this chair. Whether I’m using the computer or engaging on calls, it adapts to my needs. Especially with the pull out leg rest that I really enjoy. It’s by far my favorite feature. The wheels also glide smoothly on my wood surface (even worked on my carpet) and the swivel function adds convenience.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The quality is fantastic, beautiful chair in my photo. Easy assemble, even though had a lot parts. did not take long at all. Very comfortable, you can lay down the back seat have rest. nice big seat and support.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Comfortable was easy enough to setup but legrest could be longer
reviews.reviewText: headline is pretty much all I have to say about it. It's a really nice quality chair feels nice to sit for the price it's just that the legrest doesn't stretch far out enough to be comfortable

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars making it a joy to sit in for extended periods
reviews.reviewText: As soon as I received this chair, I couldn't wait to assemble it. After using it for few days, I find it incredibly comfortable.it is good seating experience .my back is pain .but this chair is make me feel good after i sitting in for 2 hours . I particularly like that it comes with a footrest, allowing my legs to get proper relaxation. so far i am happy with my purchase In a few months, I will provide an additional update on my user experience

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Amazing executive chair.
reviews.reviewText: This is actually an amazing chair. I would definitely buy this chair. I love the the footrest thing that comes out of the bottom. I work for a long time in office and it actually really good for me.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good quality chair with nice faux leather, ample padding for all day and a bonus tuck away footrest.
reviews.reviewText: The Executive Leather Office Chair by BestGlory, is a great chair in so many ways, that provides comfort all day with an innovative and sometimes handy footrest. Here are some of the things I’ve learned while owning it and a few things to consider before buying.I. Quality - The build quality feels very nice in most ways, but not excellent in a few. The PU leather surfaces look and feel like good quality. However, the legs and armrest frames being made out of plastic makes it feel a bit cheaper. I’d still put the overall quality in the upper-middle level of the quality scale for office chairs and guess the longevity will be good.II. Performance – It offers a larger seating surface that’ll accommodate most people. One of the most unique features about this chair is the fun to use and comfort providing tuck away footrest. It’s nice to have for those rare times, I actually get to throw my feet up. The seat padding is also wonderful at 4.7 inches thick and a memory foam like feel, it gets appreciated as the day gets long. Every feature is easy to use and operates as designed. If you need your chairs to be really firm or you like those mesh chairs, this might not be for you.Overall, this is a solid choice by providing a durable/comfortable surface with adjustability and good value. It will support those potentially painful points and give you some control to dial it in to your specific needs. I’ll be sure to update this review, if I ever start to have problems with it.You can trust that this review is simply my honest opinion that is attempting to provide you with helpful insight that I wish I had before I picked this product. Hopefully it was helpful in your decision.

reviews.reviewTitle: a good value chair with all features I like
reviews.reviewText: I used to buy office chair from Staples, this is the first time I bought heavy item from amazon because of better price. The shipping is as good as always, it arrived next day with well packages, which exceeded my expectation since this item is over 40 bounds. The chair took me about 40 minutes to assemble with its own tool. I like the parts package, each part has its own container and labels. So it's quite easy to follow the instruction. Also it's sweet to have spare parts.The material does not look like high end, but it's good enough at this price.The chair itself is quite comfortable, no matter is sitting or laying down with foot rest, which is the main different/benefit compared to what I had before. Also I noticed the chair wheel is smooth and quiet.If there is anything to improve, it will be the way to adjust the headrest. Current one is a bit hard to push the button and adjust the height of headrest.Overall, at this price, $199, I like this chair.

reviews.reviewTitle: Nice looking and very comfortable office chair
reviews.reviewText: I've been using the same chair in my home office for a few years now and it is starting to show its age. It was time to try something new, so I ordered this "executive" office chair.I am 6'1" so I need a bigger chair in order to be comfy. I find this one to be mostly a good fit, but the pan/seat is just a bit short for my long thighs. Not by a lot, but it's not a perfect fit. A shorter person would not have this issue, but if you're taller than I am this chair might not work for you.The chair comes to you in more pieces than I'm used to. You really do have to put it completely together from the ground up. But assembly went very smoothly, following the included instructions (that are admittedly difficult to read because the print is so bloody small). All the fasteners use the same hex wrench, which is supplied. Things go much quicker and easier if you have the right size hex bit and a power screwdriver.The chair's faux-leather material is very good quality (I continue to be amazed at the quality of today's synthetic leathers). It is very soft and supple but feels like it is tough also. Time will tell how it holds up under everyday use.The chair has the usual adjustments for seat height and backrest angle. The arms are fixed and cannot be raised or lowered (although you could choose not to install them if you don't like armrests). The chair also has an adjustable "headrest". I use quotes because you would have to be very short indeed for this to be a headrest. What it actually does is adjust the upper part of the backrest up or down by a couple inches. Even at its highest setting, it only comes up to the top of my shoulders.There is an integrated footrest that slides underneath the bottom of the seat when not in use. There's no harm in it being there (it is completely out of the way) but I don't find it a very useful feature. First, it is way too short for my long legs to use effectively. Second, it does not feel like it can withstand much weight at all - the metal rods supporting it have quite a lot of bend to them. I consider this to be more of a gimmick than a usable feature. But as I said, it tucks completely out of the way so no harm done.Finally, I have to mention the comfort of the seat. I don't know what it is, but this chair has the most comfortable seat I've ever sat in. (The product listing says they use a special foam and integrated springs in the chair's seat.) The backrest isn't at the most comfortable angle for me (I like to sit almost upright and this one leans back just a bit) but the seat is SO comfy.So the bottom line is: this is a very comfortable and quite good looking chair that, in my view, is definitely worth the current asking price of $249.99CAD.

The chair is easy to install and structurally solid, very strong... And the leather of the chair is very soft. Adjust the back of the chair to pull out the foot pad under the chair, you can lie down for a lunch break. Great for busy office life. I was going to use it at work, but my kid tried it and he said he liked it...

I love the chair. Very nice comfortable chair. I purchased this in brown and the quality is good. The assembly directions were very clear and it was simple to put together. The seat is very firm and the lumbar support is perfect.
Super comfortable and feels very expensive, quilted pattern looks great too. Very easy to assemble.
